lead_paragraph: Paddle8 and Auctionata sell art objects too valuable for eBay, but generally costing no more than $500,000. Terms of the merger were not disclosed.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

headline.print_headline: 2 Online Art Auctioneers Plan to Merge
headline.main: 2 Online Art Auctioneers to Merge and Go Global

snippet: Paddle8 and Auctionata sell art objects too valuable for eBay, but generally costing no more than $500,000. Terms of the merger were not disclosed.
abstract: Online auction houses Paddle8 and Auctionata are expected to announce merger.
